articles.title: Celebrity Estate Plans Series Part 3 of 4: Jay Leno's Case is No Laughing Matter
articles.description: In this third installment of our four-part celebrity series, we discuss a topic that no one wants to think about as it may seem to be a fate worse than death: incapacity.

articles.filename: Memorial Day Reflections - Crafting a Lasting Legacy Through Estate Planning.docx
articles.title: Memorial Day Reflections: Crafting Your Lasting Legacy With Estate Planning
articles.description: Memorial Day brings with it an opportunity to reflect on the concepts of mortality, and legacy. But what is a legacy, really? And how does it apply to you?

articles.filename: Would $23,000 Make a Difference to You.docx
articles.title: Would $23,000 Make a Difference to You?
articles.description: Imagine discovering thousands of dollars that belong to you, only to be told you can't have it. It's called "unclaimed property," which is money that's yours but has been handed over to the government.
